projet.title: Shader
projet.details: This project involved designing three distinct shaders in Unlit mode. Water Shader: Simulation of water movement and reflections, with the integration of a wave effect to represent dynamic waves. Terrain Generation Shader: Creation of dynamic landscapes from a plane. Cloud Shader: Design of volumetric clouds to enhance the visual atmosphere. Additionally, a day-night cycle system was integrated to improve immersion by adjusting the lighting based on time. As a bonus, I experimented with creating a fog shader, adding an extra layer to the project's atmosphere.

projet.title: Game Jam Tap Nation
projet.description: For this game jam, the constraint was to create a childhood game that would be playable on mobile. We took the concept of 1, 2, 3, soleil (also known as Red Light, Green Light).
projet.details: In this project, I was responsible for creating the music and lighting system. I also handled the camera post-processing to add a horror effect.

projet.title: Fou2foot
projet.description: Creation of a football game in Unity with local co-op.
projet.details: For this project, my contributions focused on several key elements. Player movement: Implementing the controls for both players. Procedural terrain generation: Designing a dynamic environment that is randomly generated each match. Kicking mechanics: Setting up an interaction to kick the ball randomly. Visual effects: Adding a trail effect behind the ball and players to enhance immersion. Animations: Creating and integrating animations, particularly for scoring a goal. User Interface (UI): Exploring and integrating my first user interface in a game.
